definition: to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: It becomes second nature to adapt your own style to that of the person with whom you are speaking.
sentences.chinese: 这成为将你的风格与谈话者相适应的第二天性。

sentences.english: When was the last time anyone mentioned microkernels in a conversation?
sentences.chinese: 你最后一次与人谈话中提到微内核是什么时候？

sentences.english: Guys want a playmate; they don’t want to talk.
sentences.chinese: 男人们都想要个玩伴，他们不喜欢谈话。

sentences.english: However, our chat you can no acquaint anybody, even 4 swords also not competence.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我们的谈话你不能告诉任何人，连四剑也不能。

sentences.english: Parents should also acknowledge the frightening parts of the disaster when talking with a child about it.
sentences.chinese: 与孩子谈话时，家长应清楚灾难的可怕之处在哪里。

sentences.english: Their conversation appeared to him thoroughly dull.
sentences.chinese: 他们的谈话对他似乎没啥意思。

sentences.english: Miss Liu is talking with some girl in your classroom.
sentences.chinese: 刘老师正在你们班和某个女孩儿谈话。

sentences.english: He seemed a little bit awkward when I talked to him.
sentences.chinese: 当我与他谈话时，他似乎有点不自在。

sentences.english: Before talking he shuttered all windows.
sentences.chinese: 谈话前他关好了所有的百叶窗。

sentences.english: Their conversations straightly pass through my ears.
sentences.chinese: 他们的谈话内容直穿过我的耳朵。

sentences.english: Just saying “um” or “ah” here and there won’t do it.
sentences.chinese: 若只是一味的“嗯”或“啊”这样不利于谈话的进行。

sentences.english: It is impolite to butt into other people's conversation.
sentences.chinese: 别人谈话时插嘴是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: Soon after this conversation, Haggis and Diane Gettas got married.
sentences.chinese: 这一番谈话过后不久，哈吉斯和黛安就结婚了。

sentences.english: I am due for a talking-to after my little bout with the drug store police this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今早跟药店保安周旋之后，你肯定要找我谈话。

sentences.english: Hostesses are also writing best-selling books, be they on money management or the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 陪酒女们也写出了畅销书，讲述如何理财和谈话艺术。

definition: to have an in depth conversation/to have intimate talks/to discuss thoroughly
a speech/to speak/to talk/to address/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
